item.title: I Need Help Making A Radio Station
item.dc:creator: @Him_Fast Him_Fast
item.description:
@Him_Fast wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:29, topic:212801”][quote author=Him_Fast link=topic=280236.msg2278951#msg2278951 date=1213583484]

Here is the starting code… what do i do now?

kill yourself

Oh omg thanks dude jeez… your right. Your so cool, i forgot my bad. i Asked for help , you dont have to do it, it also states that maybe you could lead me in the right direction??? Thanks pal

i did lead you in the correct direction

and how the hell is that the right direction?
[/quote]You asked for the correct direction. How are you supposed to know what it is?

Here’s a better direction, perhaps:
http://google.com

Or http://gtfomyinter.net[/quote]

obviously not the right direction is it? maybe you should follow that direction or you can go to learntobeamod.com

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Frell, post:17, topic:212801”]Do you have to use nb for something that simple? And you don’t even have a small idea of hand coding.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/layout/using.html[/quote]

item.title: I Need Help Making A Radio Station
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Him_Fast, post:10, topic:212801”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=280236.msg2278962#msg2278962 date=1213584385]
i have something to ask!

do you know what a radio station is?
[/quote]

jeez… are you serious just drop the freakin act already if it helps i meant not a radio station that when you hop in your car and turn the tracking button or whatever and this music comes out that is being broadcasted from far far away in remote reigons across the land. NO dammit i meant a radio that plays on my computer with my custom playlists like Ex. Edge Radio --Good[/quote]Then you’re going to have to learn how networking works in Java and what networking is in general. Create a client, then a server, and you’ll be good. (hint package java.io OR package java.nio of the API hint)

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help Making A Radio Station
item.dc:creator: @Him_Fast Him_Fast
item.description:
@Him_Fast wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:7, topic:212801”]If its internet radio, then you will need the code for the website too. If you don’t have that, you wont get very far.

If you want to create a playlist out of the songs on your computer and play them randomly, then thats easier.[/quote]

thanks for the help chris, but i think this is to far complex right now. i probably should have researched a little before getting into this mess. unless anyone else has something smart to say then im done with this topic…lock it

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help Making A Radio Station

item.title: I Need Help Making A Radio Station
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

If its internet radio, then you will need the code for the website too. If you don’t have that, you wont get very far.

If you want to create a playlist out of the songs on your computer and play them randomly, then thats easier.

Read full topic
